article_title: Bowen: US threat to cut Israel military aid is sign of anger at broken promises
sentence: And  as  for  the  letter,  it  will  be  too  little,  too  late  for  all  those  civilians  in  Gaza  who  have  suffered,  and  for  those  who  have  died,  as  the  result  of  months  of  restrictions  in  humanitarian  aid  imposed  by  Israel.
